description: Try our easy to follow Salmon In Banana Leaves recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Salmon In Banana Leaves Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large bunch fresh coriander, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put the fresh coriander, mint, garlic, ginger, chillies, cumin, ground coriander, sugar, lime juice and coconut milk into a food processor or blender and blend until fairly smooth. Season and set aside.

Place each salmon fillet on a square of banana leaf and spoon some of the herb and spice mixture over it. Carefully wrap the fish in the leaf to make a neat parcel and secure with wooden skewers. If the banana leaves are difficult to handle, dip them in boiling water for 15-20 seconds and they will become more supple.
Place the parcels on a large baking sheet and bake in a preheated oven at 200°C for 15 minutes.
Remove the parcels from the oven, place on a serving plate and open the packages at the table.
